LanguageData.Alien_Turian.label: Turian
LanguageData.Alien_Turian.description: The most distinguishing feature of turians is their metallic carapace. The turians evolved this trait as a defense against the greater levels of solar radiation that penetrate their homeworld's weak magnetic field.
LanguageData.Alien_Turian.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Turian.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Turian.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.Alien_Turian.tools.3.label: head
